items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the Worker.options_name_parameter member of the Worker API. By using the mapping in #2991, I've set the appropriate version numbers based upon their matching TP edition. Fixes #6455.
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.Worker.Worker.options_name_parameter

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari iOS/iPadOS for the contextmenu_event member of the Element API. This PR fixes #6376, which is where the data comes from.
items.title: Add Safari iOS versions for api.Element.contextmenu_event

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects the real values for Firefox and Firefox Android for the SourceBuffer API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/SourceBuffer
items.title: Update Firefox versions for SourceBuffer API

items.content_html: This PR removes the irrelevant WEBGL_compressed_texture_atc API as per the corresponding data guidelines. The lack of current support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2), even if the current BCD suggests support.
items.title: Remove irrelevant WEBGL_compressed_texture_atc API

items.content_html: This PR sets real values for worker support across various PRs. The results were collected using tests from the mdn-bcd-collector project.
items.title: Add/correct data for worker support for various APIs

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects the real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the FileReaderSync API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/FileReaderSync
items.title: Update Safari versions for FileReaderSync API

items.content_html: This PR removes the irrelevant identifiedTouch member of the TouchList API as per the corresponding data guidelines. The lack of current support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2), even if the current BCD suggests support.
items.title: Remove irrelevant api.TouchList.identifiedTouch feature

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Safari iOS/iPadOS for the Screen API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/Screen
items.title: Add Safari iOS versions for Screen API

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Safari iOS/iPadOS for the RelativeOrientationSensor API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/RelativeOrientationSensor
items.title: Add Safari iOS versions for RelativeOrientationSensor API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for all browsers for the XMLHttpRequest API. The data was copied from their even handler counterparts (from GlobalEventHandlers).
items.title: Add all browsers versions for XMLHttpRequest API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari iOS/iPadOS for the MouseWheelEvent API. iOS and iPadOS don't have mouse support, so there's no way they can get mouse wheel events. (The iPad Pro's trackpad isn't considered a "mouse" by Safari.)
items.title: Add Safari iOS versions for MouseWheelEvent API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Chrome and Safari for the search_event member of the HTMLInputElement API. The data was copied from its event handler counterparts.
items.title: Add Chrome/Safari versions for api.HTMLInputElement.search_event

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the Window API. The event handler data was obtained using the mdn-bcd-collector project, while the events themselves were copied from their event handler counterparts.
items.title: Add Safari versions for Window API

items.content_html: This PR removes the irrelevant beforeunload_event.custom_text_support member of the Window API as per the corresponding data guidelines. The lack of current support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2), even if the current BCD suggests support.
items.title: Remove irrelevant api.Window.beforeunload_event.custom_text_support feature

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for all browsers for the WebSocket API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v3.2.2).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/WebSocket
items.title: Add all browsers versions for WebSocket API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the TextTrackList API. The data was copied from their event handler counterparts.
items.title: Add Safari versions for TextTrackList API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the TextTrackCue API. The data was copied from their event handler counterparts.
items.title: Add Safari versions for TextTrackCue API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the RTCDataChannel API. The data was copied from their event handler counterparts.
items.title: Add Safari versions for RTCDataChannel API

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the onpayerdetailchange member of the PaymentResponse API. The data for the event handler was obtained from the mdn-bcd-collector project, while the event itself was copied from the event handler.
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.PaymentResponse.onpayerdetailchange

items.content_html: This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the tonechange_event member of the RTCDTMFSender API. The data was copied from its event handler counterpart.
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.RTCDTMFSender.tonechange_event
